item.title: CVE-2024-3262|2024-06-04T17:32:14.816Z -- best%20practical%20solutions -- request%20tracker
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in RT software affecting version 4.4.1. This vulnerability allows an attacker with local access to the device to retrieve sensitive information about the application, such as vulnerability tickets, because the application stores the information in the browser cache, leading to information exposure despite session termination.
